label: Caves Of Dragonmount 10
description:
Chester listens for Shade's snoring as he's likes to sleep. He pokes his head in and notices It's empty except for Shade's  gallery which houses various suits of armor and weaponry., at the back of his cave.  Chester then realizes nobody's home and takes to the skies..

Hit 1 to take to the skies in order to continue the search!

Hit 0 to quit.
